articles.title: Senegal's protest-hit capital left with looted shops and debris - Reuters
articles.description: Fresh clashes broke out on Saturday between opposition supporters and Senegalese police in parts of the capital Dakar, the third day of protests in the West African nation sparked by the prosecution of an opposition leader.
articles.content: DAKAR, June 3 (Reuters) - Fresh clashes broke out on Saturday between opposition supporters and Senegalese police in parts of the capital Dakar, the third day of protests in the West African nation s… [+2472 chars]

articles.author: Tom Hale
articles.title: Why Do So Many Cultures Have Dragons In Them? - IFLScience
articles.description: The dragon turns up in myths across Europe, Asia, Africa, and the Americas.
articles.content: Travel to any part of the world and its hard not to find dragons lurking in their mythological folklore. The ancient legends of Europe, Asia, Africa, and the Americas all feature the figure of a slin… [+2885 chars]
